text: The Hornet is a 1998 Serbian drama film directed by Gorčin Stojanovic. == Cast == * Sergej Trifunović – Miljaim * Mirjana Joković – Adrijana * Dragan Jovanović – Inspektor Boban Djordjevic * Branimir Popović – Abaz * Meto Jovanovski – Avdija * Ljubiša Samardžić – Profesor Lane Sekularac * Enver Petrovci – Salih * Mirko Vlahović – Redzepi * Dragan Petrović – Inspektor Peter Helmer * Miloš Timotijević – Emin * Dragan Maksimović – Azem == External links == * Category:1998 drama films Category:Yugoslav films Category:Serbian films Category:Films set in Switzerland Category:Films set in Serbia Category:Films set in Belgrade Category:Films set in Kosovo Category:Albanian- language_films Category:English-language_films Category:Serbian-language_films Category:Yugoslav drama films Category:Serbian drama films Category:Films shot in Belgrade
title: The Hornet
